amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt prime loans from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 110-450 to exempt prime loans from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 249 (Roll no. 1114).
